name: Muo, Sentinel of Light
description:
Since the dawn of the universe, the cosmos was made up of darkness and light, living in harmony. But this harmony was broken by the void which seeks to absorb all light..

Shooting stars are the source of good dreams, and spread light to the farthest reaches. But once they are absorbed into a black hole, they are transformed into nightmares. 

Muo, an ancient celestial being, has spent millennia protecting shooting stars from falling into the void of black holes and guiding them home. Ages have passed, but her mission is never done. Always she is there to keep light in the cosmos. 

Help Muo in her eternal quest, as she fights to escape an infinite time loop; to collect and orchestrate the stars, so that all beings in the cosmos may have good dreams.
